name: ReddeR (ClayByte)
description:
Description

So I’m in a class called Rapid Prototyping this semester. Each week we’re supposed to create a new game with a constraint/theme. This week’s constraint/theme is ‘Mars’.

I was inspired by the game Red. I feel like this game is a spiritual successor. I wanted to expand on his concept some, but alas I only had a week, so this is all that I could complete.

Music
Album: Virtigo
Song: Carrier District
Artist: 8-Bit Peoples

Developed In
Game Maker
